game.name: Plan B from Outer Space: A Bavarian Odyssey
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Escape the grasp of the Barbvarians! Plan B from Outer Space is a stellar adventure in the style of an interactive book and takes inspiration from classic science-fiction stories and Bavarian culture. Every decision will affect the outcome of your mission; to leave this strange planet unscathed!
